comments:
If you double click on a preference page entry in the Extensions part of the 
plug in manifest editor you get a widget is disposed exception/


STEPS
1) Open an editor on the plugin.xml for org.eclipse.ui
2) Select the Extensions pane
3) Select org.eclipse.ui.preferencepages
4) Select the first page entry
5) Double click. You will get two error warnings, a borken properties view and 
the exception below.


org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
